body.raw:
This is the documentation for the Taxonomy site. This is an example of a doc site built using [ContentLayer](/docs/documentation/contentlayer) and MDX. This site is a work in progress. ## Features Select a feature below to learn more about it.
### Documentation This documentation site built using Contentlayer. ### Marketing The marketing site with landing pages. ### App The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### Blog The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
